issue.title: [C++] Add additional type support for if_else kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12955](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12955). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current if_else kernel only supports fixed sized primitive, temporal, boolean, and null types only.

Add the following type support
 \* Fixed length binary
 \* Variable length binary

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12955?focusedCommentId=17381649) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10538
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10538>
